title: Refraction, surface tension, and speed of sound: Refractive index (Na D-line)

ref.title: Liquid Liquid Equilibria in Binary Solutions Formed by [Pyridinium-Derived][F4B] Ionic Liquids and Alkanols: New Experimental Data and Validation of a Multiparametric Model for Correlating LLE Data
